functions.author: Gyver5681
functions.title: Misc Enchants v3
pages:
§lInfinity:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use three arrows as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
RRR§r

§lMultishot:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two arrows as the reagents (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
R R§r

§lPiercing I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a cactus as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
 R §r

§lPiercing II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of redstone (R) and a cactus (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
RrR§r

§lPiercing III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use a piece of pointed dripstone as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
 R §r

§lPiercing IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two pieces of redstone (R) and a piece of pointed dripstone (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with lapis along the top and left side (L).
§lLLL
LB 
RrR§r

§lPower IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an arrow (A), a flint and steel (F), and an amethyst shard (S) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with lapis along the top and left side (L).
§lLLL
LB 
AFS§r

§lPunch I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use an arrow (R) and a potato (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL  
 B 
R r§r

§lPunch II:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two arrows (R) and a poisonous potato (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left and right corners (L).
§lL L
 B 
RrR§r

§lQuick Charge I:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use some sugar as the reagent (R). Finish the enchantment with a piece of lapis in the top left corner (L).
§lL
